posts.post_content:
Hi all.

I am currently very interested in adding a T206 Drum back to my collection.

Should you have one that you have considered moving, feel free to PM me and I would love to discuss a potential deal.

I have cash, as well as other T206's I may be willing to trade in the right deal, so we will have plenty of options on the table.

Thank You Very Much.

Derek
Trade Bait?
A wee bit more bait for you:

I've offered some people over 2k cash market value for a drum and can't get a single person to sell.  I've been looking for one for 2 years.  I still need one and am ready to drop rediculous money to get one... If I can just find one for sale.

[quote name="Blitzu" post=1100687]I've offered some people over 2k cash market value for a drum and can't get a single person to sell.  I've been looking for one for 2 years.  I still need one and am ready to drop rediculous money to get one... If I can just find one for sale.[/QUOTE]

It seems like $2k is low this day in age. I am ready to pounce with anyone who wants to play ball.

[quote name="DerekMichael" post=1100798]It seems like $2k is low this day in age. I am ready to pounce with anyone who wants to play ball.[/QUOTE]

I wasn't clear... 2k over market value. I'm even willing to pay more.  I just barely missed that god awful ugly nattress during the last auction.

got my PSA 2 Street Drum off of eBay 2 years ago for $2222.22 (that's a lot of 2's in that sentence :)), and i feel like i stole it. certainly worth a lot more now...anyway, not interested in selling, but wish you guys luck in your pursuit!

[quote name="MVSNYC" post=1100800]got my PSA 2 Street Drum off of eBay 2 years ago for $2222.22 (that's a lot of 2's in that sentence :)), and i feel like i stole it. certainly worth a lot more now...anyway, not interested in selling, but wish you guys luck in your pursuit![/QUOTE]

Lol, you don't sell anything anyways...

Touche...BUT not true (it's Johnny that doesn't sell anything- Hi Johnny! :)), i just sold 3 SLers on the BST, 2 of which were Hindus...and i've been consigning a lot to Love of the Game Auctions (more SL Hindus coming up there).

furthermore, i sold ALL of my T206 rare backs about 4-5 years ago in Barry Sloate's last auction. man, i wish i still had some of those cards. i think Wonka got a bunch of them...i've slowly been rebuilding my back set over the last 2 years.
Yep, Drum backs are true gems. Hopefully someone is interested in some cash and cards for a Drum. We shall see.

[quote name="MVSNYC" post=1100808]Touche...BUT not true (it's Johnny that doesn't sell anything- Hi Johnny! :)), i just sold 3 SLers on the BST, 2 of which were Hindus...and i've been consigning a lot to Love of the Game Auctions (more SL Hindus coming up there).

furthermore, i sold ALL of my T206 rare backs about 4-5 years ago in Barry Sloate's last auction. man, i wish i still had some of those cards. i think Wonka got a bunch of them...i've slowly been rebuilding my back set over the last 2 years.[/QUOTE]

I know, just giving you crap :)

[quote name="DerekMichael" post=1100810]Yep, Drum backs are true gems. Hopefully someone is interested in some cash and cards for a Drum. We shall see.[/QUOTE]

Hell, I offered blank backs etc for one plus cash... Denied.

With all due respect, do you mind taking your conversation off of my thread and into a PM or another thread? It just appears to me that it is getting unnecessarily cluttered, and I prefer to keep it focused and on track.

Thank You Very Much.

Sorry Derek, our bad. i figured the thread getting bumped to the top would help the cause. ;)

i genuinely wish you guys well. maybe Goodwin will have some soon, he seems to get a few here & there.

[quote name="MVSNYC" post=1100824]Sorry Derek, our bad. i figured the thread getting bumped to the top would help the cause. ;)

i genuinely wish you guys well. maybe Goodwin will have some soon, he seems to get a few here & there.[/QUOTE]

Do not be sorry, I did not mean that in a mean way, at all. I am sorry if it came off that way. It is just that the thread is becoming cluttered. 

I have a big, big goal here, and I truly hope to accomplish it.

Thank You.

Derek, 

I will try to find you a Drum (free of charge from me;), I do not own one currently, I have passed on quite a few in the past years to aquire the Freaks/Scraps that I am so obsessed with ...YES!! ...Mike is right I never part with my cards, I think I may have a problem:o....

WOW! someone passed on a BB and a cash trade for Drum??:eek:...That was n't wise inmho.....

GOOD LUCK WITH QUEST!

I will try to help both of you....gimme some time....:D

Peace

Johnny
There are 3 Drums in the latest Goodwin auction that starts later today.
Good luck guys! many great rare backs in that auction.
Thank you guys, much appreciated.
Bump, gotta be more than one out there.

I have 6 drums that PSA is currently grading (one is a WaJo). Super excited to get'em back!! Probably only 2's.

[url]https://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=342807[/url]
i didn't know another dum hofman surfaced...and a nice one at that!
